abstract: Barclays names Tim Throsby as president of corporate and international business and chief executive of its corporate and investment bank; Throsby is currently global head of equities at JPMorgan.
lead_paragraph: Tim Throsby will join Barclays in January as president of its corporate and international business and as chief executive of its corporate and investment bank.
snippet: Tim Throsby will join Barclays in January as president of its corporate and international business and as chief executive of its corporate and investment bank....

headline.main: Barclays Hires JPMorgan Executive to Head Investment Bank
